project.description: Deploy cluster env by ssh + chef.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: server_list
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue: # node1: couchbase 172.17.0.2:22 # node2: elasticsearch 172.17.0.3:22 # node3: app 172.17.0.4:22 # node4: couchbase 172.17.0.5:22 # node5: elasticsearch 172.17.0.6:22 # node6: app 172.17.0.7:22

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: chef_json
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue:
{ "common_basic": { # service hosts: deploy service to which host "couchbase_hosts":["172.17.0.1", "172.17.0.2"], "elasticsearch_hosts":["172.17.0.3", "171.17.0.4"], "xxx_hosts":["172.17.0.5", "172.17.0.6"], "haproxy_hosts":["172.17.0.1","172.17.0.2"], "nagios_server":"172.17.0.1",
# specify branch name "app_branch_name":"master", "devops_branch_name":"master",
"package_url":"http://172.17.0.1:18000",
# tcp ports "haproxy_port":"80", "haproxy_ssl_port":"443", "app_http_port":"80", "app_https_port":"443" }, "couchbase_xxx": {"memory_quota_mb":"16384"}, "elasticsearch_xxx": {"allocated_memory_mb":"16384", "audit_allocated_memory_mb":"1024", "enable_audit_elasticsearch":"false", "elasticsearch_clustername":"my-es-cluster", "elasticsearch_audit_clustername":"my-es-audit-cluster" }, "app_xxx": {"maxSimultaneousThreads":"8", "maxTotalThreads":"64", "cb_bucket_retries":"10", "cb_bucket_retryinterval":"10000", "cb_bucket_timeout":"100000", "cb_replicas_count":"2", "elasticsearch_replicas_count":"2", "elasticsearch_shards_count":"5", "elasticsearch_audit_replicas_count":"2", "elasticsearch_audit_shards_count":"5", "enable_slack_sync":"false", "session_bucket_quota_in_mb":"1024", "staging_bucket_quota_in_mb":"2048", "master_bucket_quota_in_mb":"10240", "mgmt_timeout":"900000", "max_timeout":"960000", "xxx_java_opts":"-Xms10240m -Xmx10240m", "mincomputationpoolsize":"16", "whether_flushdatabaseonconnect":"$whether_flushdatabaseonconnect", "whether_populatefakedata":"false", "whether_populaterealdata":"false", "whether_populategenerateddata":"false" } }

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: check_command
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: How to check system, after deployment or upgrade.

hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.name: env_parameters
hudson.model.TextParameterDefinition.defaultValue: export KILL_RUNNING_CHEF_UPDATE=false export CODE_SH='/root/git_update.sh' export code_dir='/root/chef' export git_repo_url=git@gitlabcn.dennyzhang.com:devops/chef_community_cookbooks.git

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
#!/bin/bash -e function download_script() { local download_file=${1?} . /etc/profile [ -n "$DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME" ] || export DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME="tag_v2" working_dir="/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_public" bash_script="${working_dir}/${download_file}" dir_name=$(dirname "$bash_script")
export DOWNLOAD_PREFIX="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/DennyZhang/devops_public/${DOWNLOAD_TAG_NAME}" if [ ! -f "$bash_script" ]; then mkdir -p "$dir_name" wget -O "$bash_script" "${DOWNLOAD_PREFIX}/jenkins_scripts/${download_file}" chmod 755 "$bash_script" fi } ################################################################################ download_file="jenkins/deploy_cluster.sh" download_script "$download_file" bash -e "/var/lib/jenkins/code/devops_public/$download_file"
